result.arabic_text: أَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ إِلَى ٱلطَّيۡرِ مُسَخَّرَٰتٖ فِي جَوِّ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَا يُمۡسِكُهُنَّ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُؤۡمِنُونَ
result.translation: Mbega ababangikanyamana ntibararaba ngo babone inyoni ingene zoroherejwe kugendera mu kirere! Nta gituma zidakorokera hasi, kiretse ko Imana Allah Yaziremeye amababa n’imirizo, Iranazishoboza kuguruka mu kirere. Mw’ishobozwa ry’inyoni ryo kuguruka mu kirere, ni ukuri harimwo ivyemezo ku bemeramana, vyerekana ubushobozi n'ububasha vy’Imana Allah.
